What is Cash on Delivery?
Cash on Delivery (COD) payment method allows you to pay by cash at your doorstep for fulfilled by Amazon and some seller fulfilled items. You will not see the Cash on Delivery as an available payment method on check out If you have at least one condition that is incompatible with cash on delivery eligibility. (Learn more)

Important information

Safety Information

Warning: For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. In case of eyes, rinse thoroughly water. If irritation occurs, discontinue your and consult a doctor. Keep product out of reach children. Store in dry cool place, away from direct sunlight. Do not ingest. Ingestion, seek immediate medical attention.

Ingredients

Phytosteryl/Isostearyl/Cetyl/Stearyl/Behenyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Diisostearyl Malate, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Polybutene, Hydrogenated Poly (C6-14 Olefin), Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Microcrystalline Wax/Cera Microcristallina/Cire Microcristalline, Octyldodecanol, Synthetic Wax, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Astrocaryum Murumuru Seed Butter, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopherol, Propylene Carbonate, Polyglyceryl-2 Diisostearate, Aluminum Hydroxide, Fragrance/Parfum, Mica, BHT, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Benzoate, Red 6 (CI 15850), Red 28 Lake (CI 45410), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891).

Directions

Apply as needed throughout the day. Can be used under or over lipstick., Use Within Recommended Period – Check jar symbol on package for months of use after opening., Use Within Recommended Period – Check jar symbol on package for months of use after opening.

Product description

Award-Winning Lip Butter Balm - This silky, 100% vegan lip mask hydrates and soothes parched lips in seconds. Butter up on the go for instant moisture and shine. Our hydrating lip balm is infused with shea and murmuru seed butters, which naturally moisturize, soothe, and condition parched, dry lips. Achieve both healthy and beautiful lips with a unique blend of vegan waxes to soften lips and provide subtle shine with no tackiness. How to Use Lip Butter Balm - Apply as needed throughout the day as a lip moisturizer, whenever lips need extra hydration. This lip balm for dry lips can be used under or over lipstick. For best results, use as an overnight lip mask. Summer Fridays' collection of skincare and beauty products provide the simplicity and efficacy you need in your self-care routine. Formulated with good-for-you ingredients, the entire product range is 100% vegan, cruelty-free and comes in sustainable packaging that can be recycled. All lip care products are natural, ethical, eco-friendly, and made without animal-derived ingredients.

How are ratings calculated?
To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyses reviews to verify trustworthiness.

  • Courtney
    5.0 out of 5 stars Summer Fridays Lip Butter Balm--Worth the Hype? YES!
    Reviewed in the United States on 3 June 2025
    Color: VanillaVerified Purchase
    I've tried a lot of lip balms-- some too waxy, others too thin, most not long lasting--but Summer Fridays Lip Butter Balm hits that sweet spot. It's a luxury balm that actually feels like it earns the price tag. This balm goes on smooth like a gloss but wears like a deeply hydrating balm. It's rich without being sticky and gives your lips a soft, pillowy finish. No weird residue. No film. Just straight up moisture. This stuff lasts. You don't have to keep reapplying every hour. It holds up well through light drinks and conversations, and after a few days of use, my lips felt noticeably softer and more hydrated--even in dry, A/C-heavy environments. Summer Fridays nailed the scent game. Vanilla is the cult favorite--sweet but not artificial. Other options like Poppy and Pink Sugar add a sheer tint that gives your lips a healthy, flushed look without going full lipstick. Great for no-makeup days. The tube is cute and Instagram worthy, it looks high end and looks good on a vanity or in your bag. It's not cheap but considering how little you need per use and the quality of the formula, I'd call it a worthwhile splurge. It's skincare-level lip care, not just a quick fix. Summer Fridays Lip Butter Balm is more than just pretty packaging. It delivers on hydration, texture, and vibe. If you're tired of reapplying drugstore balms that don't work, this is a smart upgrade. One tube, and you'll get the hype.
